module.title: Disk and file checker
module.description:
CheckDisk can check various file and disk related things.
The current version has commands to check Size of hard drives and directories.
module.name: CheckDisk

check_filesize.desc: Check or directory a file and verify its size.

check_drivesize.desc: Check the size (free-space) of a drive or volume.

check_files.desc: Check various aspects of a file and/or folder.
